fields.label: Enter all or part of the serial number of the roku you want to control. You can find this by starting from the Roku's home screen, then going to Settings>System>About and then entering all or part of the serial number. You can leave this blank if you just want it to control the first roku it finds.

Enter the IP address of the roku. Normally, the roku may be discovered automatically. If this doesn't work for any reason, you can enter the IP address of your roku manually. Note: Only use this option if you have a static IP address assigned for your roku.
